name: firardfortressdev
description: This is a system for Foundry VTT that allows you to play Firard Fortress, a custom tabletop RPG system created by [Liamor2](https://www.foundryvtt.com). Mainly inspired by the [Dungeons & Dragons](https://dnd.wizards.com/) system, and the Aventures system from [Joueur du Grenier](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jixB1pAJMqY&list=PLWmL9Ldoef0sDNxbi5wVyvoCw8uZmJR-F), this system is designed to be easy to use, and to be used by beginners and experienced players alike, with a high level of customization and liberty for the players and the game master.
